thread.section_title: Low Cost Funeral Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of low-cost-funeral.co.uk
thread.title: S Binfield-Hill
thread.title_full: Low Cost Funeral reviewed by S Binfield-Hill

author: S Binfield-Hill
title: S Binfield-Hill
text:
Memoria made the process so easy at what was a difficult time. They did exactly what my Father requested and allowed us to celebrate his life in a far better place then a crematorium or church!
I have already recommended them to many friends and family who didn't know that a direct cremation was even an option.
I spoke to far too many funeral directors and even the local authority crematorium who basically were interested because they couldn't add all the extra costs on top!
My Father's wishes were never about cost but about one's wishes. He would never of wanted my Mother to be ripped off and talked into things that weren't required by funeral directors who to be honest don't care!
Memoria are different, no hard sell, does exactly what it says all wrap up in a professional outfit!
